Optional. The name of logs that will be streamed. "allLogs" includes all possible logs for the resource. Set to '' to disable log collection.

Optional. The domain name label. The concatenation of the domain name label and the regionalized DNS zone make up the fully qualified domain name associated with the public IP address. Optional. The Fully Qualified Domain Name of the A DNS record associated with the public IP. This is the concatenation of the domainNameLabel and the regionalized DNS zone.

Optional. The reverse FQDN. A user-visible, fully qualified domain name that resolves to this public IP address. If the reverseFqdn is specified, then a PTR DNS record is created pointing from the IP address in the in-addr.arpa domain to the reverse FQDN.

Optional. The name of the diagnostic setting, if deployed. If left empty, it defaults to "<resourceName>-diagnosticSettings".

properties.displayName: Authentication should be enabled on container apps
properties.description: Container Apps Authentication is a feature that can prevent anonymous HTTP requests from reaching the Container App, or authenticate those that have tokens before they reach the Container App

properties.displayName: Container App environments should use network injection
properties.description: Container Apps environments should use virtual network injection to: 1.Isolate Container Apps from the public internet 2.Enable network integration with resources on-premises or in other Azure virtual networks 3.Achieve more granular control over network traffic flowing to and from the environment

properties.displayName: Container App should configure with volume mount
properties.description: Enforce the use of volume mounts for Container Apps to ensure availability of persistent storage capacity

properties.displayName: Container Apps environment should disable public network access
properties.description: Disable public network access to improve security by exposing the Container Apps environment through an internal load balancer. This removes the need for a public IP address and prevents internet access to all Container Apps within the environment.

properties.displayName: Container Apps should disable external network access
properties.description: Disable external network access to your Container Apps by enforcing internal-only ingress. This will ensure inbound communication for Container Apps is limited to callers within the Container Apps environment

properties.displayName: Container Apps should only be accessible over HTTPS
properties.description: Use of HTTPS ensures server/service authentication and protects data in transit from network layer eavesdropping attacks. Disabling "allowInsecur" will result in the automatic redirection of requests from HTTP to HTTPS connections for container apps.

properties.displayName: Managed Identity should be enabled for Container Apps
properties.description: Enforcing managed identity ensures Container Apps can securely authenticate to any resource that supports Azure AD authentication
